page.title: 18BIRDS/PLANTS IN PENDLESIDE
page.content: {BIRDS}About 120 different species of birds have been observed in the area including: Black Grouse Hen Harrier Heron Peregrine Ring Ouzel Lapwing Sparrow Hawk Curlew Snipe Blue tit Dotterel Skylark Great tit Geese Linnet Sparrow Owl:Longeared Lapwing Whooper Swan Tawny Wagtails, Ducks:Mallard Barn Pied Pochard Grey Tufted Meadow Pippit Yellow Kingfishers occasionally seen by river {PLANTS/TREES}Alder,Ash,Birch,Elm,Oak, Beech,Rowan,HorseChestnut,various kinds of Willow.Unpolluted atmosphere has allowed Cowslip to become re-estab lished,among a hundred or so other spe ies,including Butterbur,Dog's Mercury, Hogweed,Marsh-marigold,Water mint,Will owherb,probably{the rarest,Wintergreen
